channel.title: I cant connect to my own rsps
channel.description: i recently made my own rsps but i cant connect to it. its port fowarded correctly, my friends can connect but i cant seem to get on, i changed all the local ip's to 127.0.0.1 and it just says error connecting. can anyone help me fix this? ive tried everything i cant seem to get it. my no-ip is on, everythings done right i just cant seem to find the problem, someone help me please. its a 317 delta if thats any use.

item.title: I cant connect to my own rsps
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

still doesnt work… i dont see what it could be if other people are on it but im not… does any1 know how to make a webclient?

Read full topic

item.title: I cant connect to my own rsps
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

sorry I should of been more specific… try turning off your router firewall… just type your default gateway into the browser, and there should be something in there to turn it off…

item.description:

item.title: I cant connect to my own rsps
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

127.0.0.1 will work whether it’s online or not… try turning your firewall off, let me know if that helped…

item.source: I cant connect to my own rsps

item.title: I cant connect to my own rsps
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Are you trying to connect online or just by yourself to program?

Online = All the ip’s changed to your no-ip.
To program alone = 127.0.0.1

In your client.java for your Client folder.

Read full topic
